mapper.insert: insert into weizu_user( avatar_url, city, country, gender, language, nick_name, province, open_id, create_time, modify_time ) values ( #{avatarUrl}, #{city}, #{country}, #{gender}, #{language}, #{nickName}, #{province}, #{openId}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select id as id, avatar_url as avatarUrl, city as city, country as country, gender as gender, language as language, nick_name as nickName, province as province, open_id as openId, rights as rights, manager_rights as managerRights, admin as admin from weizu_user where id = #{id}

select id as id, avatar_url as avatarUrl, city as city, country as country, gender as gender, language as language, nick_name as nickName, province as province, open_id as openId, rights as rights, manager_rights as managerRights, admin as admin from weizu_user where open_id = #{openId}

select id as id, avatar_url as avatarUrl, city as city, country as country, gender as gender, language as language, nick_name as nickName, province as province, open_id as openId, rights as rights, manager_rights as managerRights, admin as admin from weizu_user where nick_name is not null and nick_name!='' and (rights is null or rights='0')

select id as id, avatar_url as avatarUrl, city as city, country as country, gender as gender, language as language, nick_name as nickName, province as province, open_id as openId, rights as rights, manager_rights as managerRights, admin as admin from weizu_user where nick_name is not null and nick_name!=''
